Package com.fortify.pub.serialization

Class FileBasedClassNameMatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fortify.pub.serialization.FileBasedClassNameMatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClassNameMatcher
    public abstract class FileBasedClassNameMatcher
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClassNameMatcher
    A ClassNameMatcher that matches list of class names loaded from a file found on classpath. The filename may be passed to constructor or default filename will be used. See DEFAULT_WHITELIST_RESOURCE for the default value.

    The format of the whitelist file is one binary class name per line (e.g. name retrieved by Class.getName(). If the file cannot be found, read or parsed, the matcher will be successfully constructed, but no class names will be matched.

    Note: instances should be cached, because the file with class names is loaded and parsed for each instance.
